name: Halal Housing - A Scheme for the Faithful
tagline: Are you dreaming to own a house without going for a Bank Loan?
body: Bismillahir Rahmaanir Raheem - _In the Name of Allah the Most Beneficent, The Most Merciful_!! ## About Us If there is a will there are multiple ways. Owning a decent flat in metropolitan cities of India through Halal means is no longer a distant dream. After so many years of patient waiting, contemplation and ground work, we are finally able to arrive at launching housing projects under the banner of **Halal Housing** - a novel housing scheme for the truly faithful. It is a hard reality that many of our brothers and sisters are still not in a position to have a own house in spite of a decent earning for the simple reason that they don’t want to go against the tenets of Islam by taking a conventional home loan from a Bank and fall into the traps of paying interest for the rest of their lives. **Halal Housing** is the result of their patient waiting and putting their complete trust in Allah. _Alhamdulillah_, under this scheme we have already completed one project in Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore and we are just starting our next project in the same vicinity but in a much bigger area. Our mission is to create more and more such projects, that will make housing affordable, simple and enjoyable. Here is the gist of this novel scheme - Pay a minimum of 35% upfront of the total cost and balance in maximum 36 EMI’s (Interest FREE) which is _Three Years_. For example, if the total cost of a flat is 30 lakhs, then you pay 10.5 lakhs (35%) minimum upfront payment and the balance 19.5 lakhs in maximum 36 EMI’s of approximately **Rs.55,000/-** each. We are sure this sounds very attractive and irresistible, _Alhamdulillah_. ## Project Summary Summary | Details ------------ | ------------- Project Name | **Dar-e-Salaam**, second project under the Halal Housing Scheme Location | Central Excise Layout, Dodda Kammanahalli, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore No. of Flats | 13 flats, Car Parking in the Stilt, 3 flats per floor * four floors. One Pent house on top Avg. Area per Flat | Around 1200 SFT Spacious Flat with ample lighting and ventilation Architects | [Enif Designs](http://www.enifdesigns.com/), Bangalore, a young and vibrant Architectural Firm with a track record of designing some award winning projects Land Details | Measuring a total of around 4000 SFT (66 Ft X 60 Ft), Owned by two Sisters both of them are doctors, "A" Kaatha Property with very clear titles Project Timelines | Start from 1st of May 2016 and estimated to be completed within 15 months. Possession in the month of September 2017, _in shaa Allah_. ## Location The location of **Dar-e-Salaam** is Central Excise Layout, Dodda Kammanahalli (Less than a km from Bannerghatta Road) with close proximity to major business establishments, hospitals, schools and IT companies. The place is ideal for living as it is a very decent locality with many big apartments. At a distance of hardly half a kilometer from the project site is **Madheena Masjid**. Some of the big projects within few hundred meters are Century Paradise, Subodhya Laurals, Amada WalMark, Raja Aristos, etc. The exact coordinate (Lat/Long), **12°51'41.6"N 77°36'10.8"E**. Exact distance from… * Jayadeva Hospital – 7.0 Kms * Royal Meenakshi Mall – 2.3 Kms * Electronics City – 12.0 Kms * T John College (NICE Road) – 2.9 Kms * Mantri Pinnacle (Tallest Residential Tower in S.India) – 1.0 Km Site visit can be arranged for brothers / sisters who want to come and see the place before making a flat booking.
